sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="project-card" color="blue darken-2" outlined :elevation="elevation" @click="onClick" :class="{ 'hover-effect': isHovered }" @mouseenter="onMouseEnter" @mouseleave="onMouseLeave">
    <v-card-title class="project-name">{{ "projectName" }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text class="student-count">{{ 55 }} Students</v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    projectName: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    studentCount: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    },
    elevation: {
      type: [Number, String],
      default: 1
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isHovered: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    onClick() {
      // Emit a click event when the card is clicked
      this.$emit('click');
    },
    onMouseEnter() {
      // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters the card
      this.isHovered = true;
    },
    onMouseLeave() {
      // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves the card
      this.isHovered = false;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.project-card {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px; /* Adjust max-width as needed */
  margin: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: box-shadow 0.3s; /* Smooth transition for shadow effect */
}

.project-card.hover-effect {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 15px 5px rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5); /* More visible shadow effect on hover */
}

.project-name {
  font-size: 20px; /* Increase font size for better visibility */
  font-weight: bold;
  color: white; /* Text color */
}

.student-count {
  font-size: 16px; /* Increase font size for better visibility */
  color: #ffffff; /* Text color */
}
</style>
